data.message: Hello, I have an issue with posts timeline. When I change posts to "Most Recent" it shows posts two-three days old and only around 14 of them until I reach end. When I switch back to Top Stories it shows all stories. I want to see them by most recent.

replies.message: Hi Lukáš. If you're having trouble with your Home Page or News Feed, please use this form to tell us about the issue you're experiencing: http://bit.ly/2gTAgEQ. -Tenaya

Facebook I Want To Verified Plz Help Me

Facebook It have been 3 days i'm facing this problem.So many report I have send,but still not receive answer from facebook team.

All my post in this 3 days aren't appearing in my newsfeed and my frienlist newsfeed.It happen since facebook team suspended my account and ask for verification ID.

Please help me.I really need all of this can be fix as soon as possible.My world have no colours anymore after this problem happen to me.I have no friends out of there.I only have happening friendlist in my account facebook. 

I really appreciate for your help an your kindness.Please help me fix this facebook team .Please.
